name: Siegius [Fanmade port]
description:
Warning!

This is made by fans for fans, I don't gain anything doing this, it's just so that other people can play this wonderful game, IF THE CREATORS WANT ME TO REMOVE THIS, I WILL REMOVE IT IMMEDIATELY, since I AM NOT THE CREATOR OF THE GAME THIS IS JUST A PORT FROM FLASH TO EXE

Originals creators:

Mike Sleva and Juice-Tin (Sky 9 Games Studio)

Original description: 

 Siegius is a strategy game in which the player must choose one of the 3 factions available 2 factions avaible* (the boar faction is not avaible)

Each of the factions favor different playstyles and strategies. Set the path of your soldiers to the enemy side!

What is this and why i did this?

Siegius is an old flash game that managed to captivate thousands of people with its aesthetics, gameplay, and story and many people who have a faint recollection of the game will surely want to play it again, however, being a flash game, it is difficult but not impossible to play it again, still, since it is a flash game, finding and playing it becomes a challenge.

However, I am very fond of this game, so much so that since the original developers of the game do not want to make a remake of the game, I have decided to port the flash version to exe, so that those people who could not or cannot play it, now if you can play it.

Avaible Factions:
  • Caesar: Balanced faction with a easy difficulty
  • Vercing: Unbalanced faction with a hard difficulty

NOT TESTED ON LINUX AND MACOS | Version: 0.0.1
